modName: Kingdom Hearts - Keyblade Collection (Plus Extra's) right files
summary: These are the right files for the keyblades no ckm file
descriptionHtml:
This is an uplaod from me with the right files for "Kingdom Hearts - Keyblade Collection (Plus Extras) because the previous uplaod from Marineman97 had a ckm file in it. Please Note i am not the author of this mod the original author is BobbyChiller so no support from me Please understand that.

(Sorry, just Copy & Paste)

A Collection of Keyblades from the game "Kingdom Hearts" 

All blades are duel-wieldable. 

To create the base keyblade you will need 3 iron ingots and 4 gold ingots,
All the other keyblades require the base keyblade as an ingredient
aswell as a unique ingredient. 

============================================================================== 
----UPDATE TWO---- 
============================================================================== 
30th December 2012 
- Added all keyblades from KH2 apart from Destiny's Embrace. 
Keyblades Added = Bond of flame, Circle of life, Follow the wind, Guardian Soul,
Gull wing, Hero's crest, Monochrome, Mysterious Abyss, Photon debugger,
Rumbling Rose, Star seeker, Way to the dawn. 

- Added all shields from KH2 
Shields added = Adamant Shield, Akashic Record, Chain Gear, Dreamcloud, Falling
Star, Genji, Knight Defender, Knight's shield, Nobody Guard, Ogre
Shield, Save the king 

- Added dream sword from the dream sequence intro of KH1 

============================================================================== 
----UPDATE ONE---- 
============================================================================== 
28th December 2012 
- Added Hidden Dragon Keyblade 
- Added Sora's Keyblade (Keyblade D) 
- Edited stats of Fatal Crest Keyblade / Added New Unique weapon enchantment "Berzerk" 

Most noticable change in the update is the reversal of all keyblades as they were facing the wrong way :P silly me.
